data.title: Home
data.meta_description: The Institute for Advanced Learning and Research serves as a regional catalyst for economic transformation throughout Southern Virginia.
data.meta_site_name: Institute for Advanced Learning and Research
data.text:
Mission

The Institute for Advanced Learning and Research serves as a regional catalyst for economic transformation. The mission will be accomplished through applied research, advanced learning, economic development, manufacturing advancement and conference services.

focus

Driving Economic Transformation is at the heart of everything we do at the Institute for Advanced Learning and Research. Learn how we discover breakthroughs, create opportunity, grow innovation, power progress and host excellence. Each of our divisions plays a critical role in preserving and delivering this mission on a daily basis.
